title: Millions May Face EU Visa Free Travel Restrictions Soon
excerpt: The European Union is preparing major changes to its visa-free travel policy, which could affect millions of third-country nationals.

title: Poland Study Visa New Rules in Effect from July 1, 2025
excerpt: Poland introduces updated visa rules affecting all international students starting July 1, 2025.

title: NASA Postdoctoral Program 2025 Deadline Extended
excerpt: NASA has extended the deadline for the 2025 Postdoctoral Program, giving applicants more time to apply.

title: Gotoh Tokyu Group Scholarship 2026 at Tokyo City University
excerpt: Fully-funded scholarships are now available at Tokyo City University for international master's and PhD students.

title: English Language Requirement Updated for New Zealand AEWV
excerpt: New Zealand has introduced a new English requirement for work visa applicants under AEWV, effective July 2025.
